byteoperations

Class ByteOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • byteoperations.ByteOperations

  • public class ByteOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that provides byte operations for working with bytes, byte arrays, and hexidecimal strings
    Version:
    March 4, 2013, July 20, 2013 Fixed a bug in the getIndexOfByteListInByteList function that produced false returns when working with delimeter byte arrays greater than or equal to two bytes in length, July 29, 2013 Modification to the logic for ASCII conversions to rely on the native specification. Minor other refactoring.
    Author:
    Joshua Dickson

      • getIndexOfByteListInByteList

        public static int getIndexOfByteListInByteList(java.util.List<java.lang.Byte> dataBuffer,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.Byte> delimiter,
                               int offset)
        Get the index at which the bytes in the data buffer match those in the delimeter
        Parameters:
        dataBuffer - the List of Bytes to search
        delimiter - the Byte List to find in the data buffer
        offset - the position in the data buffer at which to begin searching
        Returns:
        the offset of the index at which the match begins, or -1 if the match is not found
